name: Untitled Turn-based Puzzle Game
description:
Shaved away by time and incompetence, what was originally intended to be a 2D RPG in the vein of Paper Mario has become this, a point-and-click puzzle disguised as a turn-based RPG.

Created to start learning game dev, with the excuse of creating a Game Off 2021 submission.

Screenshots from development.

Development blog + source: https://yourwaifuisalie.github.io/game-off-2021/

Total expected play time: 5 minutes
